text.en: The price of rice falls by 35%. How much extra quantity of rice can be bought with money that was sufficient to buy 104kg of rice previously?
text.hi: यदि नमक की कीमत 20% घट जाती है, तो उपभोग को कितने प्रतिशत बढ़ाना होगा ताकि खर्च समान रहे?

trick_application: Price =  20 -> 13 (7 unit kam hua), then consumption is reverse 13 -> 20. ( 7 unit badha becuase expenditure same hai, yehi 7 unit ki value nikalni hai)
so, consumption ke 13 unit ki value is 104 kg, 8 times then extra quantity rice is 7 unit  x 8 = 56 Kg

source.book: CGL Practice king by Gagan Pratap
